para.text: In the Layer Property Flow package, parameters can be used to define aquifer properties. In this model, two parameters are used to define the hydraulic conductivity. To see the definition of the parameters, select
On the left, expand "Flow Packages" and select the LPF package, and then click on HK to see the parameter definitions (fig.
). Parameter "HK_Par1" has a value of 150 and HK_Par2 has a value of 200. Both parameters use Zone arrays. HK_Par2 uses a multiplier array. Click
